Literature.Title: Enhancement of Antimicrobial Function by L/D-Lysine Substitution on a Novel Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Peptide, Phylloseptin-TO2: A Structure-Related Activity Research Study
Literature.Author: Yin W, Yao J, Leng X, Ma C, Chen X, Jiang Y, Wang T, Chen T, Shaw C, Zhou M, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human fibroblasts MRC-5:IC50=77.28 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=77.89 µM,Horse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=74.78 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MBC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=16µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MBC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=16µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=32µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MBC=64µM),Human lung adenocarcinoma NCI-H838(MIC=3.32µM),Human lung carcinoma NCI-H460(IC50=2.31µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(IC50=13.86µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=15.18µM)
